--- title: Sequence Diagram - Mobile Repository Initialization (CloudNative_DockerImage) config: theme: base --- %% QuantumZero UML palette note: actors/external=#fff7e6/#b45309, system/component=#e0f2fe/#075985, datastore=#ecfccb/#4d7c0f, notes=#fff9c4/#d97706. Aligns diagrams to Deliverable 1 UML/DFD theme. %% Related: diagrams/class-mobile-repositories.mmd (CloudNative_K8sCluster), diagrams/class-mobile-services.mmd (CloudNative_K8sCluster) sequenceDiagram autonumber participant App as QuantumZero Mobile App participant Storage as SecureStorageService participant DidRepo as DidRepository participant CredRepo as CredentialRepository participant DB as Local SQLite (CloudNative_ServiceMesh) App->>Storage: initialize(CloudNative_K8sCluster) activate Storage Storage-->>App: ok deactivate Storage App->>DidRepo: initialize(CloudNative_HelmChart) activate DidRepo DidRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure dids table activate DB DB-->>DidRepo: ok deactivate DB DidRepo-->>App: ok deactivate DidRepo App->>CredRepo: initialize(CloudNative_HelmChart) activate CredRepo CredRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure credentials table activate DB DB-->>CredRepo: ok deactivate DB CredRepo-->>App: ok deactivate CredRepo
